{"id":794005580,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1662567826,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/794005580/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"42.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        \n      Stack<Character> stack=new Stack<>();\n      for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n        if(!stack.isEmpty() \n           && \n           (\n             (Character.isUpperCase(stack.peek()) && Character.isLowerCase(s.charAt(i)) && Character.toLowerCase(stack.peek())==s.charAt(i))\n            ||\n             (Character.isUpperCase(s.charAt(i)) && Character.isLowerCase(stack.peek()) && Character.toUpperCase(stack.peek())==s.charAt(i))\n           )\n          )\n          stack.pop();\n        else\n          stack.push(s.charAt(i));\n      }\n      StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder();\n      \n      while(!stack.isEmpty())\n        sb.append(stack.pop());\n      \n      return sb.reverse().toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false}
